record.name: CategorySeriesAxis
record.description: This record refers to a category or series axis and is used to specify label/tickmark frequency.
record.author: Glen Stampoultzis (glens at apache.org)

field.name: crossing point
field.description: axis or category crossing point for 2d charts

bit.name: value axis crossing
bit.description: set true to indicate axis crosses between categories and false to cross axis midway

bit.name: crosses far right
bit.description: axis crosses at the far right

bit.name: reversed
bit.description: categories are displayed in reverse order
